name: Mortido
description:
Through me you pass into the city of woe
Through me you pass into eternal pain
Through me among the people lost for aye.

Dante Alighieri, The Divine Comedy: Hell,CantoIII


Mortido is an action-adventure game, the story about sinful soul in search of redemption.
The main purpose of the game is to redeem yourself by saving souls of people whose lives you ones ruined.



Main character appears in the underworld after his own death with a great desire to repair the damage he has caused and that gives his soul incredible strength.
In the course of the game, a player needs to fight through a number of different worlds, face various monsters created by hate and finally help broken souls to reach a better place.
Player learns a story about these people before their death through multiple items, figures out how they are connected and why they ended up in such dark and hopeless world.



  • Gloomy, but atmospheric setting.
  • Mysterious masked anti-hero.
  • Surrealism and nightmares are your new friends.
  • Charon and other mythological characters are waiting to “mingle” with you.
  • A fascinating story about travelling to personal hell and back.
